ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Too Long a Sacrifice
ComicInfo.Summary: Too Long a Sacrifice [Part 3]: Odo is forced to work with Federation Special Investigator Retlaw, to investigate the killings on the station. As the two follow the clues, they are led to unexpected suspects.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 18:14:42. [CVDB807449] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:03:24. [Issue ID 2153042]
ComicInfo.Characters: Jorri (Retlaw's daughter),Morn,Vedek Teler,Garak,Dr. Julian Bashir,Constable Odo,Captain Benjamin Sisko,unnamed Nausicaans,Major Kira Nerys,unnamed Ferengi (deceased),Rom,Ensign Coleman Schroeder,unnamed Bajorans,Quark,unnamed Betazoids,Pryal Beyal,Special Investigator Retlaw (Betazoid, Federation security agent),unnamed Federation officers
ComicInfo.Title: Too Long a Sacrifice [Part 3]
